page.title: 20Farming
page.content: The farmers in the area are becoming increasingly angry as their farms are being decreased to nothing.At the reformation centre,there was a large farm when it opened in 1857 but now there is hardly anything.Open fields could be seen in the beginning but nowthere are only small patches of grass where animals eat from and turnips for the sheep. WALTON FARM This fram has 27 cows,but no other animals apart from 2 dogs.It is next to the golf course.The cows go into the fields eating grass during summer,but go inside during winter to eat silage,brewers grains and sugar beet pulp.This farm is lucky because it has escaped the growing city and has been able to grow crops annually.This year a good crop of potatoes and wheat is expected.
